author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Changsheng Bio-technology says dividend payment date on May 4
text:
April 25(Reuters) - Changsheng Bio-technology Co Ltd
* Says it will pay cash dividend of 4.0 yuan per 10 shares (before tax) for FY 2017 to shareholders of record on May 3
* The companyâ€™s shares will be traded ex-right and ex-dividend on May 4 and the dividend will be paid on May 4
